about.mainIntro: Hi there! I am Kriti Raj! I am working as a Full Stack developer with 6 years of experience. I've worked dozens of projects designing, building and deploying applications from dev to production environment.I have experience working in multiple domains like AI, Finance and HR. With this I bring extensive experience in Web Development technologies and also with shipping the build to production.
about.secondaryIntro: Apart from developing web applications and coding, I like to play cricket, listen to music and go for parties.

resume.title: Full Stack Developer
resume.introduction: Working onsite at the client's location to better understand the requirements and apply my skills to provide intuitive response customer experience and also minimising the operation cost.
